name: Domainers Delight – Search Widget
author: Mario Fliegner (IsarDomains.com)

sections.description: This widget is intended for all domain entrepreneurs having a WordPress blog and who wants to offer their visitors the capability to search for available domain names at one of the following 3 registrars: Sedo, GoDaddy or Uniregistry. It’s possible to include an affiliate id of their partner programs (if applied).
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/domainers-delight-search directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add the plugin to any widget area of your blog or use the shortcode [dnsearch] to put it on any page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/domainers-delight-search directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add the plugin to any widget area of your blog or use the shortcode [dnsearch] to put it on any page.

Can I use the plugin without having applied for any partner program

Yes. It’s not necessary to provide a affiliate id.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial creation, submitted to WordPress plugin directory

short_description: Provide your website visitors the capability to search for available domain names on selected registrars.

It’s possible to include an affiliate id of their partner programs (if applied).
